author: cgoodale
msg: Updated the RCMED URL to use the rcmes domain instead of argo.  Thanks to Kim Whitehall's testing in DC this was discovered.
I also removed a guard against parameters with missing data.  We just have to be more careful
when using this service until the parameters table is completely filled out.

author: cgoodale
msg: Fixed 2 small typos.  Second one was causing the metrics to crash.

author: cgoodale
msg: Minor tweak to support MatplotLib 1.1.X and beyond.  Legend expects a list of maplotlib.line objects.

author: cgoodale
msg: Updated the imports to use the new svn code structure.
Also changed maskOption and seasonalCycleOption to type 'Boolean'
